languages.text: "Тогда иди ко мне в слуги. Я изыму твой слабый мозг и заменю его священным железом, которое будет получать сигнал напрямую из Имматериума. И ты познаешь все".
"Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."
languages.original_text: "Тогда иди ко мне в слуги. Я изыму твой слабый мозг и заменю его священным железом, которое будет получать сигнал напрямую из Имматериума. И ты познаешь все".

traits.locale_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

traits.locale_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

traits.locale_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: 「そして私の従者となった。あなたの脆弱な脳を捉え、非物質世界からの信号を受信することができるフェルム・サンクトゥムと入れ替えよう。そうすればあなたも全てを理解するだろう」
languages.original_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: 「そして私の従者となった。あなたの脆弱な脳を捉え、非物質世界からの信号を受信することができるフェルム・サンクトゥムと入れ替えよう。そうすればあなたも全てを理解するだろう」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “那就成为我的仆从吧。我会剔除你脆弱的大脑，将其改造为可以接收亚空间信号的钢铁圣所，之后你就全都明白了。”
languages.original_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: “那就成为我的仆从吧。我会剔除你脆弱的大脑，将其改造为可以接收亚空间信号的钢铁圣所，之后你就全都明白了。”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Dann werdet {mf|mein Diener|meine Dienerin}. Ich werde Euer schwaches Gehirn durch Ferrum Sanctum ersetzen, das Signale aus dem Immaterium empfangen kann. Dann werdet Ihr alles verstehen."
languages.original_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werdet {mf|mein Diener|meine Dienerin}. Ich werde Euer schwaches Gehirn durch Ferrum Sanctum ersetzen, das Signale aus dem Immaterium empfangen kann. Dann werdet Ihr alles verstehen."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je vous propose de vous mettre à mon service. Je m'emparerai de votre cervelle inférieure et je la remplacerai par le Ferrum Sanctum capable de recevoir les signaux en provenance de l'Immaterium. Alors, vous comprendrez tout. »
languages.original_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je vous propose de vous mettre à mon service. Je m'emparerai de votre cervelle inférieure et je la remplacerai par le Ferrum Sanctum capable de recevoir les signaux en provenance de l'Immaterium. Alors, vous comprendrez tout. »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «Entonces le acepto como sirviente. Extirparé su débil cerebro y lo sustituiré por el Ferrum Sanctum capaz de recibir señales del inmaterio. Entonces lo entenderá todo».
languages.original_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces le acepto como sirviente. Extirparé su débil cerebro y lo sustituiré por el Ferrum Sanctum capaz de recibir señales del inmaterio. Entonces lo entenderá todo».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Öyleyse hizmetkârım ol. Zayıf beynini çıkarayım ve yerine, Tindiyar'dan gelen sinyalleri algılama yetisine sahip Demir Kutak yerleştireyim. Böylece her şeyi anlayabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Then become my servant. I will seize your weak brain and replace it with Ferrum Sanctum capable of receiving signals from the Immaterium. Then you will understand everything."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse benim hizmetkârım ol. Zayıf beynini çıkarayım ve onu Tindiyar'dan gelen sinyalleri algılama yetisine sahip Demir Kutak'la değiştireyim. Böylece her şeyi anlayabilirsin."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
